My Favorite Movies

Comedy

Deadpool

Synopsis: A mercenary is experimented on and becomes immortal, seeking revenge with a dark sense of humor.

Director: Tim Miller

Star: Ryan Reynolds

Romance

La La Land

Synopsis: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles.

Director: Damien Chazelle

Star: Emma Stone, Ryan Gosling

My Film Favorite TV Shows

Kdrama

Squid Game

Synopsis: Hundreds of players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize with deadly stakes.

Director: Hwang Dong-hyuk

Star: Lee Jung-jae

Action

The Last of Us

Synopsis: A hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope after a pandemic.

Director: Craig Mazin

Star: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey
